description: Android system kills app process due to excessive memory usage. System-level memory management issue.
commonCauses: App exceeding memory budget for device class
Large heap allocation on low-memory device
Keeping too much data in memory
Not responding to memory pressure signals
Process priority too low during memory pressure
solutions: Fix memory leaks detected by LeakCanary
Use android:largeHeap="true" only as last resort
prevention: Keep memory usage below device class limits
examples: override fun onTrimMemory(level: Int) { super.onTrimMemory(level); when (level) { TRIM_MEMORY_RUNNING_CRITICAL -> { clearCaches(); releaseResources() } } }
override fun onStop() { super.onStop(); largeDataSet.clear(); imageCache.evictAll() }
